DOC.brief_title: Change Skin Elasticity With RF PEMF
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , baseline-controlled , single-center study measure change skin elasticity combine radio frequency ( RF ) pulse electromagnetic field ( PEMF ) treatment . Forty-five adult female undergo weekly treatment period 8 week . Skin elasticity measure Cutometer® prior begin treatment , week 7 3 month completion treatment . Photographs take prior treatment , week 4 , week 7 3 month completion treatment . Patient discomfort/pain satisfaction questionnaire complete , treatment .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult female subject , 18 year age old Fitzpatrick skin type IIV Ability tolerate RF/PEMF procedure , willing adhere treatment regimen Having active electrical implant permanent implant anywhere body , e.g . pacemaker , internal defibrillator Prior use retinoids treat area within 2 week initial treatment Use oral Isotretinoin ( Accutane® ) within 6 month initial treatment Patient systemic corticosteroid therapy 6 month prior start study Prior use collagen , fat injection /or method skin augmentation ( enhancement inject implanted material ) treat area within 46 week initial treatment . Treatment may perform permanent dermal implant . Prior ablative resurfacing procedure treat area laser device within 12 month initial treatment Any surgery treat area within 12 month initial treatment History keloid formation poor wound heal previously injure skin area Epidermal dermal disorder Open laceration abrasion sort area treat . History immunosuppression/immune deficiency disorder ( include HIV infection AIDS ) use immunosuppressive medication . Having form active cancer time enrollment Significant concurrent illness , uncontrolled diabetes i.e . disease state opinion Investigator would interfere treatment , heal process Participation study another device drug within 1 month prior study enrollment Tattoos treatment area .
